NEW_WORD_WINDOW.WORD_PLACEHOLDER: Word or phrase you want to learn

TRAINING.TITLE: Training

TRANSLATE_TRAINING.TITLE: Select right translation
TRANSLATE_TRAINING.DESCRIPTION: You will have to choose one of the four translation options

SENTENCE_TRAINING.TITLE: Insert the appropriate word
SENTENCE_TRAINING.DESCRIPTION: You will have to insert the appropriate word in the sentence, choosing from four options

TRAINING.NO_TRAINING_WORDS: You don't have words for training today

LOGIN_PAGE.TITLE: Sign Up or Log In
LOGIN_PAGE.NO_ACCOUNT: if you don't have an account, you can create it

SIGN_UP_PAGE.TITLE: Sign up
SIGN_UP_PAGE.ALREADY_HAVE_ACCOUNT: Already have an account? Sign In

CARDS.HEADER_DESCRIPTION: Look at the word and try to remember how it is translated. If you can, click on "Done" button and go to the next. If you can't:
CARDS.HEADER_LIST_ITEM1: Open examples of the word are using
CARDS.HEADER_LIST_ITEM2: Look at the picture that has been associated with this word
CARDS.HEADER_FINALLY: If all these steps weren't successfully, flip the card and look at the translation. Then click on "Repeat" button, and come back later.
CARDS.TITLE: All words
CARDS.HOW_QUICKLY: How quickly did you remember the word?
